sudo dscacheutil -flushcache

openssl genrsa -out rootCA.key 2048
openssl req -x509 -new -nodes -key rootCA.key -sha256 -days 1024 -out rootCA.pem -config config.conf

openssl genrsa -out lunarisapp.com.key 2048
openssl req -new -key lunarisapp.com.key -out lunarisapp.com.csr -config config.conf

openssl x509 -req -in lunarisapp.com.csr -CA rootCA.pem -CAkey rootCA.key -CAcreateserial -out lunarisapp.com.crt -days 1024 -sha256 -extfile lunarisapp.com.ext

!!!!!UPDATE THE PEM FILE
